metadata.synopsis: A short black screen that plays instead of the player sleeping cutscene the night that they have sex with Laezel after their SecondNight scene.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Agree to have sex with Laezel in the SecondNight scene. Go to sleep in the bedroll afterwards. It will play as soon as there are no other higher priority cutscenes.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Lae'zel appears at your bunk, her eyes raging with desire. You suspect you won't be getting much sleep tonight.*
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Black screen, only narrator voice visible.
